name: Kopitiam (CripsyCoffee)
description:
1. How is this game relevant to the theme? (Renewal)

The kopitiam is in a mess due to covid lockdown and after helping the stallowners fix all the problems, the kopitiam is revived and back to normal.

2. What sort of experience/message are you hoping your game will bring across to the player?

Through this game, the player would relate to the stallkeepers experiences and also how Singapore has renewed herself after covid.

3. Why did you end up choosing the direction of  your game?

We choose the topic of kopitiam as it is uniquely Singaporean and most people have enjoyed eating there. 

        

Player Controls

  • Use mouse to navigate and click
  • Press F5 to replay the game

Bugs to be expected

Rare bug:  When you complete the slapping bugs minigame, it will glitch
                        Press F5 to restart the game
